name: AgentStack HealthcareAgent
description: Multi-agent healthcare system on IBM's Agent Stack. Features a HealthcareAgent (orchestrator), PolicyAgent (insurance coverage from PDF), ProviderAgent (doctor lookup via MCP), and ResearchAgent (web health research). Agents communicate via the A2A protocol.

skills.name: Insurance Coverage Analysis
skills.description: Analyze insurance policy documents to determine coverage eligibility.

skills.name: Doctor Lookup
skills.description: Find healthcare providers via MCP-powered directory search.

skills.name: Health Research
skills.description: Research health topics and medical information from web sources.

skills.name: Patient Assistance
skills.description: Orchestrate multi-agent workflows for patient health inquiries.
